posts.post_title: WTB t206 Chase w/ Cap PB back
posts.post_content:
Looking for PSA/SGC 1

Missed out on one that popped up last week, hoping there's another out there with my name on it.
I know you said PSA/SGC 1, but there is a pretty nice PSA 2.5 out there for $71.25 or BO.  Might be a nice and affordable pickup.
